data.SOURCE:
@EndUserText.label: 'NFe Header - Root Entity'
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
define root view entity /EXEDMINB/I_NFEHEADER
  as select from /EXEDMINB/T_NFEHEADER

  composition [0..*] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEITEM       as _Items
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEADDINFORM  as _AddInform
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEFEDERALTAX as _FederalTax
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEICMSTAXTOT as _ICMSTaxTot
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEINVOICE    as _Invoice
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEISSQNTXTOT as _ISSQNTxTot
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEISSUER     as _Issuer
  composition [0..*] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEPAYMENT    as _Payment
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFERECIPIENT  as _Recipient
  composition [0..*] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEREFERENCES as _References
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFETRANSPORT  as _Transport
  composition [0..1] of /EXEDMINB/I_NFEProtocolo  as _Protocolo
  
{
  key Id,
      versao,
      statusProc,
      bukrs,
      branch,
      processo,
      atividade,
      cUF,
      cNF,
      natOp,
      mod,
      serie,
      nNF,
      dhEmi,
      tpNF,
      idDest,
      cMunFG,
      tpImp,
      tpEmis,
      finNFe,
      indFinal,
      indPres,
      procEmi,
      verProc,
      dhCont,
      xJust,
      migo,
      miro,
      delivery,

      /* composição para os itens */
      _Items,
      _AddInform,
      _FederalTax,
      _ICMSTaxTot,
      _Invoice,
      _ISSQNTxTot,
      _Issuer,
      _Payment,
      _Recipient,
      _References,
      _Transport,
      _Protocolo
}

],
